articles.author: By ZEKE MILLER Associated Press
articles.title: Impeachment drives GOP small-donor donations on new platform
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The impeachment of President Donald Trump prompted a surge of donations to Republican Party groups through its new joint fundraising platform.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) The impeachment of President Donald Trump prompted a surge of donations to Republican Party groups through its new joint fundraising platform.
WinRed, the GOP's long-awaited answer to Democratic powerhouse ActBlue, brought in $101 million in … [+1971 chars]

articles.title: Labor Dept: TVA illegally fired whistleblower
articles.description: KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — The U.S. Department of Labor has ruled in favor of a nuclear engineer who says the Tennessee Valley Authority fired her in retaliation for reporting safety and personnel concerns.
articles.content:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (AP) The U.S. Department of Labor has ruled in favor of a nuclear engineer who says the Tennessee Valley Authority fired her in retaliation for reporting safety and personnel concerns.
The Labor Department is ordering the utility to restore … [+2001 chars]

articles.author: By TALES AZZONI AP Sports Writer
articles.title: Real Madrid set to sign another Brazilian teenager
articles.description: MADRID (AP) — Real Madrid is about to add another Brazilian teenager to its squad.
articles.content:
It was a similar case with Rodrygo, who was at Santos and was also was a teen when Madrid came after him. Both initially played with Madrids B team before making their way into the main squad, and that should be the same path for Reinier if he is signed.

articles.title: Thailand launches full-time clinics dispensing cannabis oil

articles.title: Germany charges Syrian accused of commanding IS unit
articles.description: BERLIN (AP) — German prosecutors have filed terror charges against a Syrian man accused of commanding a unit of Islamic State group fighters in his homeland.
articles.content:
BERLIN (AP) German prosecutors have filed terror charges against a Syrian man accused of commanding a unit of Islamic State group fighters in his homeland.
Prosecutors in Frankfurt said Monday that the 33-year-old, whose name they didn't release, was charged… [+938 chars]
